item.title: GPT-4 and the Faraday Cage
item.description: For the majority of people working with technology, the new GPT model by OpenAi, Generative PreTrained Transformer 4, is out of Beta and will slowly begin to roll out for use in the next few weeks. What does that mean exactly? Well, for the majority of people working with technology, almost nothing.

item.title: About
item.description: Where I post from I wouldn’t describe my life as “adventurous”, sort to say, but the definition of that particular word has changed with time or context. People in general, I find, tend to cling to the letters that make up a particular word, instead of what it represents. Such words can be the words “usability”, “productivity”, “interests”, and, for the sake of the example, “adventurous”. One of the many things that have had a large impact on my outlook recently has been exactly that.

item.title: Contact
item.description: How to reach me: Mention me at the repository of your interest
